languages.text: {n}Слова людей кажутся вам искренними. Язык тела и взгляды, которыми они перекинулись, говорят о том, что новость о нападении шокировала их.{/n}
{n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова людей кажутся вам искренними. Язык тела и взгляды, которыми они перекинулись, говорят о том, что новость о нападении шокировала их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}
{n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}
{n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}
{n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们的话在你听来很真诚。他们的肢体语言与不断对视的动作让你意识到，你遭到袭击的消息让他们无比震惊。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们的话在你听来很真诚。他们的肢体语言与不断对视的动作让你意识到，你遭到袭击的消息让他们无比震惊。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sus palabras parecen sinceras. Su lenguaje corporal y las miradas que se intercambian revelan que el ataque les ha sorprendido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus palabras parecen sinceras. Su lenguaje corporal y las miradas que se intercambian revelan que el ataque les ha sorprendido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らの言葉は誠実に思えた。その身振り手振りや交わされる視線は、攻撃の報せにショックを受けていることを物語っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らの言葉は誠実に思えた。その身振り手振りや交わされる視線は、攻撃の報せにショックを受けていることを物語っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ihre Worte klingen aufrichtig. Ihre Körpersprache und die Blicke, die sie austauschen, zeigen deutlich, dass die Nachricht von dem Angriff sie schockiert hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Worte klingen aufrichtig. Ihre Körpersprache und die Blicke, die sie austauschen, zeigen deutlich, dass die Nachricht von dem Angriff sie schockiert hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leur discours vous paraît sincère. À en juger par leur langage corporel et les regards qu'ils échangent, ils sont étonnés d'apprendre que vous avez été {mf|pris|prise} à partie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their words seem sincere to you. Their body language and the glances traded between them reveal that the news of the attack has shocked them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leur discours vous paraît sincère. À en juger par leur langage corporel et les regards qu'ils échangent, ils sont étonnés d'apprendre que vous avez été {mf|pris|prise} à partie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözleri sana samimi geliyor. Vücut dilleri ve birbirlerine bakışları, saldırı haberinin onları sarstığını gösteriyor.{/n}
